item.title: 特朗普获胜被视为美联储独立性和债券市场的风险：民意调查
item.description:
受访者预计，如果特朗普获得连任，国债收益率将出现波动

。【原文：

Survey respondents expect a move in Treasury yields if Trump secures a second term

item.title: 澳大利亚央行被视为唯一面临加息风险的主要央行
item.description: 据货币市场称，如果通胀率未能放缓，澳大利亚央行今年可能别无选择，只能恢复加息，这将使澳大利亚成为大流行病后几乎已经结束的全球紧缩周期中的一个潜在例外。【原文：Australia’s central bank may have no choice but to resume raising interest rates this year if inflation fails to slow, according to money markets, setting it up as a potential outlier to a post-pandemic global tightening cycle that has all-but ended.】

item.title: 南非非洲人国民大会在选举中获得 40% 的议会席位
item.description: 南非选举委员会周日公布的选举结果显示，执政党非洲人国民大会在 5 月 29 日举行的国民议会选举中获得 159 个席位。【原文：South Africa’s governing African National Congress obtained 159 seats in the nation’s National Assembly in elections held on May 29, according to results announced by the electoral commission on Sunday.】

item.title: 卡塔尔航空公司完成波音和空客大型宽体客机订单
item.description: 据知情人士透露，卡塔尔航空公司（Qatar Airways PJSC）即将就波音公司（Boeing Co.【原文：Qatar Airways PJSC is nearing a decision on a major widebody order split between Boeing Co. and Airbus SE, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大韩航空计划最早于 7 月订购 30 架波音喷气机
item.description: 波音公司飞机的大买家大韩航空（Korean Air Lines Co.【原文：Korean Air Lines Co., a big buyer of Boeing Co. aircraft, is planning to order up to 30 new jets from the US planemaker as soon as next month.】

item.title: 利雅得航空公司将与更多航空公司深化合作协议
item.description: 利雅得航空公司（Riyadh Air）正在扩大其与全球知名航空公司的合作网络，这家沙特阿拉伯最新成立的航空公司正努力在明年上市前建立全球联系。【原文：Riyadh Air is expanding its network of partnerships with established carriers around the world as Saudi Arabia’s newest airline seeks to build global ties ahead of its market debut next year.】

item.title: 德国肖尔茨称赞大众进军廉价电动汽车领域 "非常好
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）称赞大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）开发电动汽车的举动 "非常好"，该汽车在欧洲的售价为 20,000 欧元（约合 21,696 美元）起。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz praised the move by Volkswagen AG to develop electric cars to be priced in Europe from €20,000 ($21,696) as “very good.”】

item.title: 澳大利亚房价涨势迅猛，悉尼房价创历史新高
item.description: 由于供应短缺和人口膨胀掩盖了高借贷成本的影响，澳大利亚的房地产市场在 5 月份进一步攀升，悉尼更是创下了历史新高。【原文：Australia’s housing market climbed further in May and Sydney matched a record high as a supply shortfall and swelling population overshadowed the impact of high borrowing costs.】

item.title: 土耳其有望达到最严重的通货膨胀率，峰值接近 75
item.description: 随着通胀率达到顶峰，土耳其希望即将翻过另一场危机。【原文：Turkey hopes it’s close to turning the page on another crisis as inflation tops out.】

item.title: 由于项目进展缓慢，国际航空运输协会下调了 SAF 的估计值
item.description: 国际航空运输协会（International Air Transport Association）发现，到目前为止，一些项目的交付速度还不够快，因此该协会下调了对可持续航空燃料生产的估算。【原文：The International Air Transport Association revised down its estimates for the production of sustainable aviation fuel after finding that projects are so far failing to deliver fast enough.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空的克拉克预测波音公司需要数年才能扭亏为盈
item.description: 美国宽体飞机制造商波音公司的最大买家预测，波音公司需要数年时间才能摆脱当前的危机。【原文：Boeing Co. will need years to emerge from its current crisis, the biggest buyer of the US manufacturer’s widebody aircraft predicted.】

item.title: 国际航空运输协会称，2026 年喷气机供应链问题可能依然存在
item.description: 国际航空运输协会（International Air Transport Association）总干事威利-沃尔什（Willie Walsh）表示，供应链问题一直困扰着全球新飞机的交付，这一问题可能会延续到2026年。【原文：Supply chain issues that have dogged the delivery of new aircraft around the world could stretch into 2026, according to International Air Transport Association Director General Willie Walsh.】

item.title: 利润下滑给人工智能推动的新兴市场股票反弹带来现实考验
item.description: 就在人们对人工智能和中国刺激政策的热情逐渐消退之际，一个熟悉的弱点又开始困扰新兴市场的股票投资者：企业利润下滑。【原文：Just as enthusiasm over artificial intelligence and China’s stimulus fades, a familiar weakness has come back to haunt equity investors in emerging markets: sinking corporate profits.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克停产的血癌药物有望卷土重来
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司（GSK Plc）称，一种因试验失败而不得不退出市场的血癌药物在与另一种癌症治疗药物联合使用时显示出了良好的效果。【原文：GSK Plc said a blood cancer drug it had to pull from the market after a trial failure has shown promising results when combined with another cancer treatment.】

item.title: 阿斯利康的肺癌和乳腺癌药物显著延缓病情发展
item.description: 阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）的肺癌和乳腺癌药物在两项试验中明显减缓了疾病的扩散，有可能成为某些患者的新治疗标准。【原文：AstraZeneca Plc’s lung and breast cancer drugs significantly slowed the spread of disease in two trials, potentially establishing the medicines as the new standard of care for some patients.】

item.title: 以色列反击拜登提出的加沙停火协议
item.description: 在美国总统乔-拜登提出他所谓的以色列结束对哈马斯战争的建议两天后，本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理显然没有接受协议的关键内容。【原文：Two days after US President Joe Biden laid out what he called an Israeli proposal to end its war on Hamas, it’s clear that key aspects of the deal have not, in fact, been embraced by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.】

item.title: 阿塔尔称法国将推行改革以弥补预算赤字
item.description: 法国总理加布里埃尔-阿塔尔（Gabriel Attal）在S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）决定下调法国信用评级后表示，法国希望通过进一步改革（如全面改革失业保险）来控制预算赤字。【原文：France is counting on further reforms such as the overhaul of unemployment insurance to bring the budget deficit under control, Prime Minister Gabriel Attal said in the wake of S&P Global Ratings’ decision to lower the nation’s credit rating.】

item.title: 沙特阿美发行 120 亿美元股票数小时内售罄
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司 120 亿美元的股票销售在周日开盘后不久就售罄，这对正在寻求资金帮助支付大规模经济转型计划的政府来说是一大利好。【原文：Saudi Aramco’s $12 billion share sale sold out shortly after the deal opened on Sunday, in a boon to the government that’s seeking funds to help pay for a massive economic transformation plan.】

item.title: 德国抗击大范围洪灾造成一名消防员死亡
item.description: 强降雨导致铁路运输中断，紧急救援服务已达到极限，德国南部地区仍在与大范围的洪水作斗争。【原文：Germany continues to battle widespread flooding across its south from heavy rainfall that has disrupted rail transportation and pushed emergency services to their limits.】

item.title: 非国大对与对手谈判持开放态度，但表示拉马福萨必须留下
item.description: 在南非执政党 30 年来首次失去全国多数席位后，非洲人国民大会表示愿意与任何对手讨论建立伙伴关系。【原文：The African National Congress said it is open to discussing a partnership with any of its rivals after South Africa’s ruling party lost its national majority for the first time in 30 years.】

item.title: 欧佩克+达成延长关键石油减产协议大纲
item.description: 与会代表表示，欧佩克+组织已达成一项协议大纲，将其石油供应削减的关键部分延长至下半年，该组织将继续努力避免全球石油供应过剩并支撑油价。【原文：OPEC+ has the outline of a deal to extend a crucial tranche of its oil supply cuts into the second half of the year, delegates said, as the group continues its efforts to avert a global surplus and shore up prices.】

item.title: 欧佩克+开会讨论延长减产计划
item.description: 6 月 2 日，欧佩克会议期间通往会议室的走廊。【原文：The hallway leading to the meeting room during the OPEC meeting, June 2.】

item.title: 民意调查显示莫迪压倒性获胜，印度股票和债券将上涨
item.description: 在出口民调显示印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的政党大获全胜后，印度股市、债券和卢比将在周一攀升。【原文：Indian stocks, bonds and the rupee are poised to climb on Monday after exit polls indicated a resounding victory for Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司启动大规模股票销售，测试投资者胃口
item.description: 阿美石油公司（Aramco）将于周日启动股票销售，为沙特阿拉伯筹集约 120 亿美元，这是近年来最大的交易之一，将考验投资者对沙特王国资产的兴趣。【原文：Aramco will on Sunday kick off a share sale to raise about $12 billion for Saudi Arabia, one of the biggest deals in recent years that will test investor interest in the kingdom’s assets.】

item.title: 韩国金融服务管理局警告新税将导致本地股票外流
item.description: 韩国最高金融监督机构警告说，如果明年按计划征收资本利得税，散户投资者可能会逃离当地股市。【原文：South Korea’s top financial watchdog warned that retail investors might flee the local stock market if a capital-gains tax is introduced as planned next year.】

item.title: 泰国调查网络犯罪团伙超过 2700 万美元的资产
item.description: 泰国警方正在调查一名被指控的超级黑客及其同伙通过网络犯罪活动流入泰国的超过 10 亿泰铢（2720 万美元）的财产和资产。【原文：Thai police are probing more than 1 billion baht ($27.2 million) of properties and assets that an alleged superhacker and his associates channeled into the country from their cybercrime activities.】

item.title: 欧洲央行首次降息后，世界利率走势将出现分化：生态周
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周四可能会为欧元走软打开大门，因为其本轮周期的首次降息使该地区走上了与美国不同的政策道路。【原文：The European Central Bank could open the door to a weaker euro on Thursday as its first interest-rate cut of the cycle puts the region on a divergent policy path from the US.】

item.title: 祖马再次否认南非选票不一致指控
item.description: 南非前总统雅各布-祖马（Jacob Zuma）重申了他对计票不准确的指控，尽管选举结果显示他的新党 "前进党"（uMkhonto weSizwe）已经蚕食了执政党非洲人国民党（African National Party）的支持率。【原文：South Africa’s former president, Jacob Zuma, reiterated his allegations about discrepancies in counting of votes even as election results showed that his new uMkhonto weSizwe Party had eaten into the support of the ruling African National Party.】

item.title: 智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇提出堕胎和安乐死合法化计划
item.description: 智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇（Gabriel Boric）表示，他将提出一项使堕胎完全合法化的法案，并将加快对安乐死提案的讨论。【原文：Chile President Gabriel Boric said he will introduce a bill to fully legalize abortion and will also accelerate debate on a euthanasia proposal, two plans that face an uphill battle for approval in a divided Congress.】

item.title: 贷款狂潮掩盖了违约损失的上升：信贷周刊
item.description: 上个月，企业利用现金追逐信贷的机会，出售了创纪录的杠杆贷款。然而，只要看一眼违约回收率，就会发现这种债务的风险越来越大。【原文：Companies sold a record volume of leveraged loans last month, taking advantage of the cash chasing credit. A glance at recovery rates for defaults, however, highlights a growing risk in this debt.】
